data.name: Echo
data.description: Born deaf, Maya Lopez possesses the ability to mimic the movements of others, using it to become the formidable warrior known as Echo.

starItems.name: Echo
starItems.description: Born deaf, Maya Lopez possesses the ability to mimic the movements of others, using it to become the formidable warrior known as Echo.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>75%</color> damage.
<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>85%</color> damage.
<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage on secondary attack
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to Bonus Attack

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage on secondary attack
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to Bonus Attack

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
<color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage on secondary attack
Always Bonus Attack

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage.
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage on secondary attack

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.
Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>25%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this targets the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Dodge breaks this Chain.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to secondary target

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>25%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this targets the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Dodge breaks this Chain.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to secondary target
Always Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>25%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this targets the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Dodge breaks this Chain.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> damage to secondary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> target within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>95%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>25%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this targets the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Dodge breaks this Chain.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to secondary targets
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage.
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>25%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this targets the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Dodge breaks this Chain.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage.
Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of previous target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>25%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this targets the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Dodge breaks this Chain.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>90%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to secondary targets
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets
Apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage.
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets within <color=#86e619>2</color> spaces of the previous target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>25%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

Apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to self and <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this targets most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.

Dodge breaks this Chain.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
If a target does not have <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, reduce that character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. If a target does not have <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, reduce that character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to secondary targets
Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color>-<color=#86e619>6</color> targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>4</color>-<color=#86e619>6</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns. If a target does not have <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, reduce that character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

1.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>75%</color> damage.

On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage if this character has any <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> enemies.
1.nextUpgrade:
When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage
If this character does not have <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, reduce enemy Assist Chance by <color=#86e619>50%</color>

2.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

If this character does not have <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, reduce enemy Assist Chance by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.
On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage if this character has any <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> enemies.
2.nextUpgrade:
When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage
<color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage

3.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

If this character does not have <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, reduce enemy Assist Chance by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.
On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage if this character has any <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> enemies.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies
If this character does not have <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, reduce enemy Assist Chance by <color=#86e619>100%</color>

4.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

If this character does not have <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, reduce enemy Assist Chance by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage if this character has any <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> enemies.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
4.nextUpgrade:
When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage
<color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage

5.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

When an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

While this character does not have <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, reduce the Assist Chance for enemies by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
On <color=#fff568>Blind</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage if this character has any <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> enemies.
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage. <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
